attributes.action: Bring back capital punishment to anybody found guilty of taking human lifes with an offencive weapon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ben Kinsella was a harmless young lad who was killed by knife crime for no apparent reason. He is one of 17 young people this year to be killed.

We propose that anybody found guilty of using a knife to kill should face the death Penalty & anybody found carrying a knife for no lawful reason should be sent out to Iraq & Afghanistan.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
